entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
